In pursuance of the Single Donor Trust Funds Framework Agreement between Sweden. represented by the Swec ish International Development Cooperation Agency, Sida ("Sweden") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ("IBRD") and the Internalional Development Associa-ion (the "IDA") (collectively the "Bank") dated March 17, 2011 (the "Framework Agreemen:."), I am pleased to inform you that Sweden will make available a grant (the "Grant") of Swedish Kronor thirty five million (SEK 35,000,000), to be administered by the Bank for Alba-iia Water Resources and Irrigation Project (Trust Fund No. TF071946). Section 1.02. The terms of the Framework Agreement shall apply to the Grant. The Grant shall be us.ed exclusively for the following activities which form part of the Project to be financed by the Baik: (a) Institutional Support for Integrated Water Resources Management. Establishment of a strategic framework for management of water resources through, inter ilia: (i) Preparation of a national integrated water resource management strategy. (ii) Preparation of river basin Management plans for the Drin-Buna and Semani river basi-is. (iii) Establishment of a consolidated water resources database to be used as a basis for national water resources planning and programming (b) Implementation Support. Provision of support for the implementation of the Project and establishment and implementation of a performance based management information system. Section 1.04. The Grant shall be used to finance the following categories of expenditure: goods, training, consultants' servi,es, and incremental operating costs. Article 2 Payment Modalities Section 2.01. Sweden shall deposit the Grant funds with the Bank, upon request from the Bank, in such bank account designated by the Bank, in accordance with the provisions of Section 6.02 the Framework Agreement. The first installment of the Grant will be SEK 14,000,000. Subsequent installments will be made in accordance with the provisions of Section 6.02(b) of the Framework Agreement. Section 2.02.
